name: Crossbow Mastery

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dex 15, Point-Blank Shot, Rapid Reload, Rapid Shot.

sections.body: The time required for you to reload any type of crossbow is reduced to a free action, regardless of the type of crossbow used. You can fire a crossbow as many times in a full attack action as you could attack if you were using a bow. Reloading a crossbow for the type of crossbow you chose when you took Rapid Reload no longer provokes attacks of opportunity.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: Starting at 6th level, a ranger with the archery combat style may select Crossbow Mastery as a combat style feat.
sections.name: Special

description: You can load crossbows with blinding speed and even fire them in melee with little fear of reprisal.
